title: Gigi Hadid smiles as she steps out in NYC in a colorful cardigan and jeans after Tyler Cameron split
text:
She was a stunner in haute couture when she walked the runways of Fashion Weeks in New York and Paris recently.

And Gigi Hadid looked equally chic in casual wear when she was seen out in NYC on Sunday.

The smiling supermodel, 24, whose split from Bachelor star Tyler Cameron was revealed on Thursday, donned a heavy cardigan in color blocks of orange, white and pink with violet stripes.

Casual chic: Supermodel Gigi Hadid sported a color block cardigan and a huge smile when she was spotted out in NYC on Sunday

She wore it over a white T-shirt, knotted at the waist, plus distressed jeans and sneakers.

Gigi styled her hair in a messy topknot and she appeared to be make-up free although her eyes were hidden behind shades.

She slung a small pink purse over her shoulder and accessorized with three gold chains and pearl drop earrings.

If she was missing Tyler, 26, she certainly didn't show it, beaming brightly as she walked along, checking her phone.

Out and about: The 24-year-old wore her colorful cardi over a white T-shirt, knotted at the waist, plus distressed jeans and sneakers

Moving on: If she was missing her beau of two months, Bachelorette star Tyler Cameron she certainly didn't show it

Gigi has been supported in this difficult time by her model gal pal Martha Hunt who went with her to Saturday Night Live's after-party at Zuma restaurant in NYC on Saturday.

Meanwhile, Gigi and Tyler were first spotted together in early August. Tyler was a standout on Hannah Brown's season of The Bachelorette, where he came in second.

They seemed inseparable to begin with - he even accompanied Gigi to her grandmother's funeral in the Netherlands in early September.

By her side: Gigi has been supported in this difficult time by her model gal pal Martha Hunt who went with her to Saturday Night Live's after-party at Zuma restaurant in NYC on Saturday.

Brief affair: She and Cameron, 26, seen leaving Justin Theroux's bar, Le Turtle in Manhattan in August, were together for just two months

But it obviously wasn't meant to be.

Tyler was Gigi's first relationship since her split from her One Direction alum Zayn Malik, 26.

The couple's on-off affair lasted from November 2915 until this past January.

Rocker beau: Tyler was Gigi's first boyfriend since her January split from her One Direction alum Zayn Malik, 26, in January after their on-off, three-year affair
description: If she was missing her beau of two months the 24-year-old supermodel certainly didn't show it when she was spotted out and about with a huge smile in New York City on Sunday.
